original_text:
This is what the Lord says:
“Heaven is my throne,
    and the earth is my footstool.
Where is the house you will build for me?
    Where will my resting place be?
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 하늘은 나의 보좌요 땅은 나의 발판이니 너희가 나를 위하여 무슨 집을 지으랴 내가 안식할 처소가 어디랴

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
and the earth is my footstool.
Where is the house you will build for me?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나를 위해 지을 집이 어디에 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Where will my resting place be?
